Package com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.analytics

Class SessionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.analytics.SessionClient
  • public class SessionClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client for managing starting and stopping sessions which records session events automatically as the session is stopped or started. It is recommended to start the session when the application comes to the foreground and stop the session when it goes to the background.

      Start a session which records a SESSION_START_EVENT_TYPE event and saves that sessionId to the AnalyticsClient to be used for recording future events.

        public SessionClient​(PinpointContext pinpointContext)

    • Method Detail

      • startSession

        public void startSession()
        Start a session which records a SESSION_START_EVENT_TYPE event and saves that sessionId to the AnalyticsClient to be used for recording future events. This triggers an update of the endpointProfile. It is recommended to start the session when the application comes to the foreground.

      • stopSession

        public void stopSession()
        Stops a session which records a SESSION_STOP_EVENT_TYPE event and flushes the events in localstorage for submission. It is recommended to stop the session when the application goes to the background.

      • pauseSession

        public void pauseSession()
        Briefly pauses an application session. This records a SESSION_PAUSE_EVENT_TYPE event. It is recommended to call in an activity's onPause() method.

      • resumeSession

        public void resumeSession()
        Resumes an application session. This records a SESSION_RESUME_EVENT_TYPE event. It is recommended to call in an activity's onResume() method.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overridden toString method for testing
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        diagnostic string
